meanings.sent1: The inturned edges of the box kept the contents secure.
meanings.sent2: The inturned petals of the flower gave it a unique shape.
meanings.sent3: The inturned corners of the paper made it look like a tiny boat.
meanings.sent4: Her inturned thoughts reflected her introverted nature.
meanings.sent5: The inturned path led deep into the forest, hidden from view.

meanings.definition: Having a part that is turned or bent inward
meanings.sent1: The inturned handle of the cup made it easy to hold.
meanings.sent2: The inturned rim of the bowl prevented spills.
meanings.sent3: The inturned design of the chair made it surprisingly comfortable.
meanings.sent4: His inturned smile showed his shyness.
meanings.sent5: The inturned edges of the bookshelf kept the books neatly in place.
